Head Blacksmith Moka:
Oh, it's you! What brings you here? Now I am very busy with preparing a report so please speak to the point.
What's with the Isle of Souls? I've been digging for ages and haven't found a single useful stone in this blasted land! Hey, Fisler, what do you think? Huh?
And you'd never believe all the strange requests I've been getting. Shouldn't buildings exist simply so that people can live there? What the...
Oh, sorry... What is it you wanted? If it has to do with politics, go to that oldie over there, Fisler! He has all the answers!
